revision.text:
[[File:Wailmerpail.png|thumb]] == Details == ===Description=== This is a tool for watering [[Berries]] you planted to make them grow more quickly ===Acquisition=== Defeat 10 Pokemon on Route 13 or Route 15. When either is complete, the Wailmer Pail will appear in the [[Key Items]] list, and the farm will be unlocked with one slot to plant [[Berries]]. ===Effects=== You can now access the [[Farm]] on the corner of Route 14 and Route 15, allowing you to plant [[Berries]] to use for trades. {{Key Items}}
[[Category:Key Items]] [[Category:Items]]

[[File:Wailmerpail.png|thumb]] == Details == ===Description=== This is a tool for watering [[Berries]] you planted to make them grow more quickly ===Acquisition=== Completing Route 13 or Route 15, Whichever is done first ===Effects=== You can now access the [[Farm]] on the corner of Route 14 and Route 15, allowing you to plant [[Berries]] to use for trades. {{Key Items}}
[[Category:Key Items]] [[Category:Items]]

[[Category:Key Items]] [[Category:Items]]
